original_text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you always, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 분부한 모든 것을 가르쳐 지키게 하라 볼지어다 내가 세상 끝날까지 너희와 항상 함께 있으리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Teaching them to observe all things
and, lo, I am with you always
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내가 항상 너희와 함께 있으리라

sentences.original_text: even unto the end of the world
